# Web Automation Skills

Browser automation, workflow automation, and web interaction skills.

## Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| **playwright-mcp** | Browser automation - web scraping, form filling, testing, screenshots, PDFs |
| **n8n-automation** | n8n workflow automation for integrating services and APIs |

## Use Cases

- Web scraping and data extraction
- Automated testing
- Form automation
- Workflow orchestration
- Service integration
